# How to Download House Of Cards Season 3 Subtitles 720p
 
If you are a fan of the political drama series House Of Cards, you might be looking for a way to download the subtitles for season 3 in 720p quality. Subtitles can help you enjoy the show better, especially if you are not a native speaker of English or if you have hearing difficulties. In this article, we will show you how to download House Of Cards Season 3 Subtitles 720p in a few easy steps.

## Step 1: Find a Reliable Source for Subtitles
 
The first step is to find a reliable source for subtitles. There are many websites that offer subtitles for various movies and TV shows, but not all of them are trustworthy or accurate. Some of them might contain malware, viruses, or spam. Others might have poor quality subtitles that do not match the audio or video. Therefore, you need to be careful when choosing a source for subtitles.
 
One of the best sources for subtitles is [Subscene](https://subscene.com/). Subscene is a popular and reputable website that provides subtitles for thousands of movies and TV shows in different languages. You can find subtitles for House Of Cards Season 3 in 720p quality on Subscene by following this link: [https://subscene.com/subtitles/house-of-cards-third-season](https://subscene.com/subtitles/house-of-cards-third-season).
 
## Step 2: Download the Subtitle File
 
The next step is to download the subtitle file from Subscene. To do this, you need to select the subtitle that matches your video file name and language preference. For example, if you have downloaded the video file named "House.of.Cards.S03E01.720p.WEBRip.x264-2HD.mkv", you need to select the subtitle named "House.of.Cards.S03E01.720p.WEBRip.x264-2HD" in English.
 
Once you have selected the subtitle, click on the download button and save the file to your computer. The file will be in a compressed format, such as ZIP or RAR. You need to extract the file using a software like WinRAR or 7-Zip. The extracted file will have an extension of .srt or .ass.

The final step is to add the subtitle to your video player. There are many video players that support subtitles, such as VLC Media Player, KMPlayer, or PotPlayer. You can use any of these players to watch House Of Cards Season 3 with subtitles in 720p quality.
